about_the_game:
Ghosts are elusive beings. Until this morning, you didn't even have proof of their existence. But after months of waiting, you have finally been hired for your first job as a ghosthunter!

Little Ghosthunter is a puzzle adventure game about helping a family of ghosts escape their house, and their struggles. In the corners of the old secluded cottage, you can find connections to their pasts and the keys to their freedom.

As you help your spectral companions, you are forced to confront ghosts from your own past. Ever since your best friend's passing, you have been searching for a way to contact her from the great beyond. Now that you are closer to the spirits of the afterlife than ever before, this is your chance to unlock the secrets of the paranormal and bring her back to the world of the living.

Features

  • Find secrets in locked cabinets and hidden rooms.
  • Delve into the ghosts' core memories through vivid flashbacks.
  • Use your camera to take photos of clues you may want to remember.
  • Help the ghosts come to terms with their deaths.
  • Everyone has horns.
